name: Mini Fruit Pastry
contains: Wheat flour, Butter, Egg, Milk, Apple dice, Mango, Cherry, Strawberry.

name: Pain aux Raisins
contains: Wheat flour, butter, raisin, milk, sugar, egg, corn starch, milk powder, glaze.

name: Peanut Butter
contains: Rich creamy peanut butter fills this delicate cookie to melt in your mouth at every bite.

name: Peanut Butter
contains: The sweetness of these milky white chocolate chips are sure to brighten up your day after just one bite of this cookie.

name: Peanut Butter
contains: A nutty twist to our classic chocolate chip cookie that you’re sure  to find delicious! The balance of semi sweet chocolate chips and chunks  of walnuts bring your taste buds to a new level.

name: Double Dark Chocolate
contains: A chocolate-based cookie combined with bitter 72% dark chocolate chips creates a decadent sensation you don’t want to miss.

name: German Chocolate
contains: This chocolate-based cookie is filled with sweet coconut flakes and  delicious pecans to create the perfect recreation of this delicious  cake.
